alert.note: Alert for Benson; Eddy; Ramsey; Towner (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 25 at 12:42PM CST until December 25 at 4:00PM CST by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM CST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to 2 inches with total snow accumulations 5 to 8 inches in a narrow area. East winds 20 to 30 mph will lead to blowing and drifting snow. * WHERE...Towner, Benson, Ramsey and Eddy Counties. * WHEN...Until 4 PM CST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Blowing snow will significantly reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snowfall amounts and visibilities will vary over short distances.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for North Dakota can be found at dot.nd.gov/travel and for Minnesota at 511mn.org, or by calling 5 1 1 in either state.
